Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2012 07:13PM inmate4232010 wrote: I go to Swedish and have experienced nothing but the best treatment.  My radiation doctor even called to see how I was doing when he found out I was re-diagnosed.  They have become a family that I trust and "enjoy" seeing.  If you would like a recommendation for an ONC please feel free to PM me. I should also say that I have a few friends that have gone to Fred Hutch and received top-notch care.  It really does boil down to your comfort level.  Check them both out. Gilda's club is great!  Spring Carnival was so much fun last year I can't wait to go again!  Good luck on the move and welcome to Seattle.  As a native I am biased, but hey, I think it is the best place on earth to live!
